Articles.Content:
These. [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grid_fin](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grid_fin)

I'd like to see these implemented for rocket steering when in the lower atmosphere.
Sure. I'll add them to the sounding rockets mod.

The [LazTek SpaceX](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29388) mod has them, and so does the [Kerbonov Kn-2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66502-Kerbonov-Kn-2-Cockpit-Module) mod
I do believe that SXT has them, as well.
